body.text: It begins...the blogging I mean...this is day 1 of the 'keeping myself accountable' blog. I'll be summarizing whatever I've worked on during the day here from now on. Although this won't actually be visible until my new portfolio site goes live. Oh well.

Anyway, today's work has been simple, after midding hard on an interview assessment I've done some portfolio work. I whipped up a quick and dirty model for the notice board object and wrote some state management code allowing the click event to display a projects list div overlaying the 3D canvas.
The portfolio is slowly coming together...I'll likely mix in some game dev nonsense here too, just to spice things up. Until tomorrow!
